title: New Discord Server
message: Click here to join the Discord server

title: IMPORTANT: Update to the latest version
message: A potential memory leak was introduced in v2.5.6. Update to v2.5.11 or newer when you can. Click here for more information

title: New PRO Feature: Automatically fetch Steam Credentials
message: Sick of manually copying your Steam Credentials into SGI? With PRO, you can now fetch them automatically! Click here to learn more

title: Changelogs have moved
message: Changelogs have moved and are now available on the Steam Game Idler website. Click here to view them online

title: Steam Credentials have moved
message: The 'Steam Credentials' setting has been moved to 'Settings ‚Üí Steam Credentials'. Click here to learn more about the change

title: PRO. What is it? Is SGI changing?
message: SGI isn't changing! Click here to learn more about Steam Game Idler PRO, a new way to support SGI with in-app benefits

title: New Feature: Global Max Idle Time
message: Click here to learn more about the new global max idle time feature released in 2.4.0

title: New Feature: Per-Achievement Unlock Delay
message: Click here to learn more about the new per-achievement unlock delay feature released in 2.4.0

title: POLL: Do you want custom plugins for SGI?
message: Click here to view the poll and cast your vote

title: New Task Scheduling Feature
message: Click here to learn more about the new Task Scheduling (beta) feature released in 1.14.0

title: Beta v1.14.0-1
message: New beta version available

title: Steam API Issues
message: Steam API is currenlty experiencing issues. This may cause problems with Steam Game Idler. If you encounter any issues, please wait a few hours and try again

title: Steam Market History Calculator
message: I just released a CLI tool that calculates the total money you've earned via selling items on the Steam market. Be sure to give it a star on GitHub. Click here to check it out

title: Which Feature Should Be Added to SGI
message: I have a couple of ideas for new features to add to SGI, but I would like your feedback. Click here to vote

title: Help Translate SGI with Crowdin
message: Steam Game Idler is now available for translation on Crowdin. Click to help translate SGI into your language

title: [UPDATE] Account Mismatch Error
message: You can enable Steam Client Beta Participation again. Click to read more

message: The Steam Client Beta Participation feature is causing this error. Click here to see how to fix it
